overview: Harry, an American actor, travels to Rosario, Argentina in search of some iconic filmmaker. Harry hopes to be directed by the filmmaker's latest independent film. The director is nowhere to be found. This leads to mistaken identities, mixed up situations, characters and misunderstandings, leading Harry into a Kafkaesque, no-win situation as he gets lost in Rosario.
title: Desafinado: perdido en Rosario
